public class Board extends Object
Represents the game Board

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int numPlayers, Hand hand)
      Default constructor.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - int, number of players.
      hand - empty initial hand.

  • Method Details

    • drawBoardItems

      public void drawBoardItems()
      Draws random items to fill the board.

    • getItem

      public void getItem(Coordinates coordinates) throws LimitReachedPickException, OutOfBoardPickException, EmptySlotPickException, NotLinearPickException, NotCatchablePickException
      This is called when a player picks an item from the board.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates of element to pick.
      Throws:
      LimitReachedPickException - when too many items get selected.
      OutOfBoardPickException - when player tries to pick an element that's out of the board.
      EmptySlotPickException - when player tries to pick an item in an empty spot.
      NotLinearPickException - when player tries to make a non-linear pick.
      NotCatchablePickException - every other not pickable cases.

    • isCatchable

      public boolean isCatchable(Coordinates coordinates) throws LimitReachedPickException, OutOfBoardPickException, EmptySlotPickException, NotCatchablePickException, NotLinearPickException
      True if we can pick an item from the board.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - coordinates to check.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if an item can be picked from the board.
      Throws:
      LimitReachedPickException - when too many items get selected.
      OutOfBoardPickException - when player tries to pick an element that's out of the board.
      EmptySlotPickException - when player tries to pick an item in an empty spot.
      NotLinearPickException - when player tries to make a non-linear pick.
      NotCatchablePickException - every other not pickable cases.

    • releaseHand

      public void releaseHand()
      Puts the hand back into the board, undo operation.

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Does everything that needs to be done once player's turn is ended.

    • putBackInBag

      public void putBackInBag()
      Puts items left on the board back into the bag.

    • checkRefill

      public boolean checkRefill()
      Checks if the board needs to be refilled.
      Returns:
      boolean, returns true if the board has to be refilled.

    • getLivingRoom

      public Item[][] getLivingRoom()
      Living room getter. The living room is the actual table.
      Returns:
      returns living room, a matrix of items.

    • getLivingRoomItem

      public Item getLivingRoomItem(Coordinates coordinates)
      Getter for just an item.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - of the elements to get.
      Returns:
      returns an item from the board.

    • getMask

      public int[][] getMask()
      Getter for the mask. The mask is a matrix used to check the actual fillable spots based on the number of players.
      Returns:
      matrix of int, board's mask.

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Gets the number of players.
      Returns:
      int, number of players.

    • setLivingRoomItem

      public void setLivingRoomItem(Coordinates coordinates, Item item)

    • getLocal

      public Sendable getLocal()
      Method used to create a LocalBoard. This object is used to minimize information sent on network.
      Returns:
      Sendable, returns a LocalBoard.

    • setEventKeeper

      public void setEventKeeper(EventKeeper eventKeeper)
      Sets the event keeper for the listenable object.
      Parameters:
      eventKeeper - The EventKeeper instance to set.

    • notifyUpdate

      public void notifyUpdate()
      Notifies all listeners about the update of the listenable object.

    • notifyUpdateToID

      public void notifyUpdateToID(String id)
      Notifies a specific listener with the given ID about the update of the listenable object.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the listener to notify.

    • notifyEvent

      public void notifyEvent(Sendable sendable)
      Notifies all listeners with the given sendable event.
      Parameters:
      sendable - The sendable event to notify.

    • notifyEventToID

      public void notifyEventToID(String id, Sendable sendable)
      Notifies a specific listener with the given ID about the sendable event.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the listener to notify.
      sendable - The sendable event to notify.
